section.title: Data
section.para: Eclipse SCADA is, as the name says, a SCADA system. SCADA stands for supervisory control and data acquisition .

So the main purpose of this system is to gather data from various systems, aggregate them, evaluate the state and visualize the result. In addition it must provide a way to control the connected systems. Of course it is also important to store data in a persistent storage for later evaluation.

So the main functions provided by Eclipse SCADA are:
DA – Data Access
The acquisition of near realtime process data.
AE – Alarms & Events
Monitor the data provided by the DA system. Store monitoring results.
HD – Historical Data
Store value data provided by the DA system.
